attributes.action: Reduce VAT/Tax on Gas; Oil; Petrol; Diesel to counteract sanctions affecting UK.
attributes.additional_details: The cost of living and effects of uk sanctions that affect the cost of living, which isn’t the intended target of such sanctions.
attributes.background: Review and reduce VAT or tax on fuel.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Reduce fuel duty and VAT by 40% for a period of 2 years: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/599089

Temporarily suspend all taxes on all fuels and energy bills: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/610585
